report.title: Select occurrences to add insect data mapping.
report.description: Map occurrences with specimen code filter.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id=csf.id JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id = snf.id JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional conf on conf.id = o.id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND ((trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_end >= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_start <= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-12-31' as date))) AND ('#specimen_code#' = '' OR '#specimen_code#' = conf.attrs_json->>('#specimen_code_occ_attr_id#')) #idlist#

param.name: specimen_code_occ_attr_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence attribute that holds the specimen code.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

param.name: year_sort_order
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: specimen_code
param.description: Specimen code to search for. Leave blank for all.

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || case when substring(snf.survey_title from 1 for length(snf.website_title)) = snf.website_title then trim(substring(snf.survey_title from length(snf.website_title)+1)) else snf.survey_title end

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(csf.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#user_id#' AND csf.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: belongs_to_site
column.sql: CASE WHEN csf.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when csf.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else csf.input_form end
